alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 1:15PM CST until December 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Western and Central North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. Do not use generators or grills inside.
info.instruction: If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. Avoid outside activities if possible. Do not use generators or grills inside.
